document_data.caption: A map showing Pain Street in west Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Pain Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Pain Street''' was a small road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Pain Street begun and ended on [[Cobble Road]], turning along its midpoint to reconnect with the larger road. Pain Street was located in west Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. [[Fire Way]] connected with the eastern arm of Pain Street.
document_data.Notable Locations: The most prominent buildings found along Pain Street were the [[Tower of Pain Exalted]], a temple to [[Loviatar]], and [[the Whipwalker's Cloak]], a tavern that mostly catered to Loviatar's faithful.
